scripts.testrpc: ganache-cli --gasLimit 13000000 -e 100000 --networkId 666 --accounts 100 --mnemonic "miss eight laundry magnet country gospel cruise flavor pledge street patient catch"
scripts.flatten: truffle-flattener contracts/RoyaltyRegisterHub.sol > flatten/RoyaltyRegisterHub.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/MerkleValidator.sol > flatten/MerkleValidator.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/NiftyConnectExchange.sol > flatten/NiftyConnectExchange.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/NiftyConnectTokenTransferProxy.sol > flatten/NiftyConnectTokenTransferProxy.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/NiftyConnectProxyRegistry.sol > flatten/NiftyConnectProxyRegistry.sol
